title: Bitcoin Derivatives Traders Are Betting on Further Upside Despite September Risks
summary: Crypto traders are optimistic but cautious, considering a potential rate cut that could impact September's bearish trends. Stay tuned for updates on Bitcoin's m

body.raw:
![Bitcoin Derivatives Traders Are Betting on Further Upside Despite September Risks](https://cdn.decrypt.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/bitcoin-bull-decrypt-style-gID_7.jpg)

Crypto traders are optimistic but cautious, considering a potential rate cut that could impact September's bearish trends. Stay tuned for updates on Bitcoin's market movements.

---

**Original Article:** [Decrypt](https://decrypt.co/337835/bitcoin-derivatives-traders-further-upside-despite-september-risks)

*This article was originally published on [Decrypt](https://decrypt.co/337835/bitcoin-derivatives-traders-further-upside-despite-september-risks) and has been curated for our readers.*
